doctor.name: Dr. Saqi Md. Abdul Baqi
doctor.specialty: Hematology (Blood Diseases, Thalassemia & Blood Cancer) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Saqi Md. Abdul Baqi is a Hematologist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hematology). He is a Consultant, Hematology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Comilla Trauma Center. Practicing hour of Dr. Saqi Md. Abdul Baqi at Comilla Trauma Center is 3pm to 6pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 511, Nazrul Avenue, Ranir Bazar Road, Kandirpar, Cumilla
